item.description:
Boston SEO & Affiliate Marketing Networking Group meets the first Monday of each month.

We invite local Boston seo, affiliate marketing and search engine marketing professionals in New England area to join us.

Robbins Library
700 Massachusetts Avenue
Arlington, MA 02476

@ Community Room That holds a 100 people

Take The elevator to the basement

Parking: Try on Mass Ave if not there is a lot across the street behind Bank of America & Not Your Average Joe's restaurant

Agenda:

6:30pm to 7pm: Open Networking

Business Card Buffet: drop you card on the networking buffet

FOOD from sponsor...

Todd Bairstow
Keyword Advisors

That provide home improvement companies with a risk-free, cost-effective way to generate qualified sales inquiries from homeowners in their marketing areas.

Todd is a former Boston SEO speaker with over 13 years of Internet marketing experience.

7pm to 7:45: 2 Min Elevator Pitch:

* Tell us about you and your business or website interest
* Any networking goal your trying to achieve out of this meeting?

7:45 to 8:15pm: Guest Speaker:

Byron White
Founder
LifeTips.com & IdeaLaunch.com
Creaters of SEO content grader

Topic: Content Marketing: The art of listening to your customers wants and needs, and the science of delivering in a compelling, engaging way.‚Äù

Bio:
Byron White is the President and founder of ideaLaunch. He is an active speaker at various Search Marketing conferences including PubCon, Affiliate Summit, eComXpo and more. He is the hosts of the weekly LifeTips radio show on WebMasterRadio.FM every Wednesday at 4 PM EST. Byron's entrepreneurial success has been well documented in Inc. Magazine, AdWeek, The Boston Globe, The Boston Business Journal, Portfolio Magazine and numerous other publications. Prior to starting ideaLaunch, Byron founded Freelance Access, a graphics arts placement agency representing copywriters, graphic designers and web designers, which was acquired by Aquent.


8:15 to 8:45pm Open Round Table Discussion


8:45pm The End

We look forward to seeing you all at this informal Boston search engine round table discussion!


The Cambridge SEO MeetUp

----------------------------------
Guest Speaker's Wanted:

We've been working hard to find industry experts and to develop a formal agenda to keep it interesting for all those that attend at this new big meeting room.

Food Event Sponsors:

SEO Pro's, will work for food! Contact us about sponsoring the event with goodies and drinks in exchange for publicity. Details at www.BostonSEO.org/sponsor

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: Boston SEO & Affiliate Internet Marketing Networking Group
